t: Definition: Labels (BPS, 2D Label, SSCC and AMZNCC) | Amazon & Marketplace SOPs
s: SSCC (Serial Shipping Container Code) labels (most preferred) – Amazon EDI vendors using document 856 can use the SSCC labels. The SSCC is an 18-digit number with 2 zero prefix used to identify logistics units that is used in LP Receive.
